content: Hi, I'm looking for some information on a new vaccine trial that was supposed to start last month. Can you tell me more about it?
I think there might be some confusion. We don't have any record of a vaccine trial starting last month.
That's strange, I could have sworn we had discussed this in the last meeting. Can you check our internal database to see if it exists?
I've checked our database and I couldn't find any information on a vaccine trial starting last month.
Okay, that's weird. Can you also check the FDA website to see if they have any information on it?
